name: Ouroboros: A Dungeon Crawling Adventure [IGMC2022]
description:
This game was created for the Indie Game Making Contest 2022

Seliqa, a young apprentice wizard, is looking for the Egg of the Ouroboros, the legendary treasure that holds the secret of True Resurrection. Accompanied by her warden, Sir Amber of Grimvale, Seliqa ventures inside the Sanctuary of the Ouroboros.

  • 100% hand-drawn graphics
  • 1~2 hours of gameplay
  • Dungeon Crawling gameplay: fight, get the loot and level up!
  • Gear = Skills: characters will gain new abilities by equipping weapons, armors and accessories.
  • The Curse of the Ouroboros: Characters will get older—or younger!—while exploring the Sanctuary
  • MissingSeven (Game Design, Development, Graphics, Story)
  • CrawlingChaox (Game Concept, Proofreading, English Localization)
  • Michael Primo, CrawlingChaox (Testing)
  • Youfulca (Music)
  • Visustella, DKTools (Plugins)
